column2: "Hello, are you a new ARKS member?"
"My name is Rebecca, I'm part of the quest counter staff."
"Would you mind stopping by the quest counter, next to the Campship gate?"
"This is the quest counter from where you can accept quests for missions."
"Over there leads to the shop area where you can buy items to prepare for missions."
"Anyways, I am Anneliese. I look forward to working with you."
